card.name: Dark Indora, God of Darkness
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, for each card linked to this one, your opponent destroys one of their creatures and puts a card from their mana zone into their graveyard. ■ When this creature is destroyed, return one of your other Gods from your graveyard to your hand. ■ God Link (tooltip

card.name: Shine Valkyrie, Heavenly God
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ God Link (tooltip ■ Whenever this creature is linked with a God, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Blue Poseidon, Sea God
card.text: ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ Whenever you draw a card at the Step#Step 2 (Draw) ■ God Link (tooltip

card.name: Flame Agon, God of Flames
card.text: ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures. ■ This creature gets "power attacker +2000" for each card linked to this one. ■ God Link (tooltip

card.name: Perfect Earth, Planetary Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Each card put into your hand from your shield zone gets "shield trigger".

card.name: Last Violence
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ Destroy one of your opponent's non-multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent chooses 2 non-multicolored cards in their mana zone and puts them into their graveyard. ■ Search your deck. You may take a multicolored creature from it, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Bolmeteus Musha Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

card.name: Musha Lupia
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ Whenever your "tooltip

card.name: Violence Heaven (card)
card.text: ■ This spell costs up to 3 less to summon for each of your linked Gods in the battle zone. It can't cost less than 1. ■ Destroy all creatures except Gods.

card.name: Infinity Phoenix, Phoenix of the Dragon Flame
card.text: ■ Vortex evolution—Put on 2 of your fire creatures. ■ Each of your Dragons and Phoenix in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures. ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may return any number of fire creatures from your graveyard and/or mana zone to your hand instead. Then return this creature to your deck and shuffle it. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Queen Alcadeias, Holy Gaia
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Evolution—Put on one of your multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells other than multicolored spells. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Terradragon Balgazarmas
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your creatures that has Dragon in its race attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Dragon, put it into your hand. If it isn't a Dragon, put it into your mana zone.

card.name: Musha Decapitation Sword
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5000 or less. If you have at least one tooltip

card.name: Space Crawler
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each civilization in your mana zone, you may look at a card from the top of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Qurian
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Zero Phoenix, Phoenix of Darkness
card.text: ■ Vortex evolution: Put on one of your darkness creatures and one of your fire creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand. Then you may choose 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone and put them into their graveyard.

card.name: Dark Lupia
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your Dragons are destroyed, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Emperor Marco
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Cyber Lords. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw 3 cards. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Bolpheus Heaven, Super Holy Dragon
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Vortex evolution—Put on 2 of your Angel Commands and/or Armored Dragons. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a light or fire spell in your hand For No Cost ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Colorful Dance
card.text: ■ Put the top 5 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Then put 5 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard.

card.name: Blade Worm, Decapitating Insect
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -1000 power for each civilization you have in your mana zone until the End Step

card.name: Jelly, Dazzling Electro-Princess
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Death Mendosa, Dragonic Baron of Death
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.

card.name: Drag Innocent, Savage Swordsman
card.text: ■ You can put an evolution creature of any race on this creature. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put a Dragon from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Skell Eye, Savage Mecha King
card.text: ■ Multi ■ This creature can't attack creatures. ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ This creature can't be attacked. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a creature from it, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Baron Gouyama
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a card from it and put it into your mana zone. If you do, put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard and put a non-evolution Wild Veggies not named '''Baron Gouyama''' from your mana zone into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Necrodragon Heavy Kerberos
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever one of your creatures with Dragon in its race is destroyed, you may draw 2 cards.

card.name: Savage Earth
card.text: ■ Put a non-evolution creature from your mana zone. Choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone and your opponent puts it. Then choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures from the battle zone and put them into their owner's mana zones.

card.name: Oboro Kagerou, Moonlight Mecha
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may draw a card for each civilization in your mana zone. Then put the same number of cards you drew from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Peach Princess, Fearless Faerie
card.text: ■ During your turn, the second creature you summon may cost up to 2 less to summon. It can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Faerie Miracle
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ If you have all civilizations in your mana zone, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.
